title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure, National
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform (Alteration of Name of Department and 
Title of Minister) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 5 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited public expenditure national development plan delivery reform (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 5 june 2025

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Caiteachais Phoiblí, Seachadta ar an bPlean 
Forbartha Náisiúnta, agus Athchóirithe and, in the English language, the 
Department of Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Caiteachais Phoiblí, 
Bonneagair, Athchóiriúcháin Seirbhíse Poiblí agus Digitiúcháin and, in the 
English 
the Department of Public Expenditure, 
that of 
Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and Digitalisation. 

language, 

to

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Caiteachais Phoiblí, Seachadta ar 
an bPlean Forbartha Náisiúnta, agus Athchóirithe and, in the English language, 
the Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform, is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Caiteachais Phoiblí, 
Bonneagair, Athchóiriúcháin Seirbhíse Poiblí agus Digitiúcháin and, in the 
English language, to that of the Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, 
Public Service Reform and Digitalisation.

title: the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939), hereby
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

(b) 

references to the Department of Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform shall be construed as 
references 
the Department of Public Expenditure, 
Infrastructure, Public Service Reform and Digitalisation, and 

to 

references to the Minister for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform shall be construed as 
references to the Minister for Public Expenditure, Infrastructure, 
Public Service Reform and Digitalisation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th June, 2025.

4 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
